nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry

Class BaseGeometry<TActual extends BaseGeometry>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.BaseGeometry<TActual>
  • Type Parameters:
    TActual - the actual type of this geometry
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryConvertable<TActual>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CyclicGeometry, GeometryGroup, HalfLine, Line, OrientedGeometry, Vector

    public abstract class BaseGeometry<TActual extends BaseGeometry>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeometryConvertable<TActual>
    This class implements an abstract geometry type, providing a common base class for various geometric objects.

    • Method Detail

      • intersect

        public java.util.List<BaseGeometry> intersect(BaseGeometry other)
        Compute the intersections between this and the given geometry, using the standard precision of DoubleUtil.EPS. Note that the result must be independent from the input geometry.
        Parameters:
        other - geometry with which intersection should be computed
        Returns:
        list of geometries describing the intersection

      • intersect

        public java.util.List<BaseGeometry> intersect(BaseGeometry other,
                                              double prec)
        Compute the intersections between this and the given geometry, using a specified precision. Note that the result must be independent from the input geometry.
        Parameters:
        other - geometry with which intersection should be computed
        prec - precision of the computation
        Returns:
        list of geometries describing the intersection

      • intersect

        public void intersect(BaseGeometry other,
                      java.util.List<BaseGeometry> intersections)
        Compute the intersections between this and the given geometry, using the standard precision of DoubleUtil.EPS. Note that the result must be independent from the input geometry.
        Parameters:
        other - geometry with which intersection should be computed
        intersections - list in which to store the intersection

        public boolean onBoundary(Vector point)

        point - test point
        Returns:
        whether point touches the boundary

      • closestPoint

        public abstract Vector closestPoint(Vector point)
        Computes the point on this geometry that is closest to the provided point. Note that this need not be a new vector.
        Parameters:
        point - point for which to find the closest on this geometry
        Returns:
        closest point

                               double prec,

        Compute the intersections between this and the given geometry, using a specified precision. Note that the result must be independent from the input geometry.

        prec - precision of the computation

      • translate

        public void translate(Vector delta)
        Translates the geometry.
        Parameters:
        delta - the coordinates of this Vector are used as displacement in X-coordinate and Y-coordinate

      • rotate

        public abstract void rotate(double counterclockwiseangle)
        Rotates the geometry. Positive values indicate a counterclockwise rotation; negative values a clockwise rotation.
        Parameters:
        counterclockwiseangle - angle of rotation

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double counterclockwiseangle,
                   Vector center)
        Rotates the geometry around a given center point. Positive values indicate a counterclockwise rotation; negative values a clockwise rotation.
        Parameters:
        counterclockwiseangle - angle of rotation
        center - center position around which to rotate

      • scale

        public abstract void scale(double factorX,
                           double factorY)
        Scales the geometry, differently in X- and Y-coordinates.
        Parameters:
        factorX - factor of scaling in X-coordinate
        factorY - factor of scaling in Y-coordinate

      • scale

        public void scale(double factor)
        Scales the geometry uniformly.
        Parameters:

      • scale

        public void scale(double factor,
                  Vector center)
        Scales the geometry uniformly, maintaining a given center point.
        Parameters:
        factor - factor of uniform scaling
        center - position that remains fixed while scaling
